title: Bug 116564: Hyperlink builder title changes with settings
description: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
OB: When 'OK' is clicked, then the hyperlink builder is reopened. The actual result is that its title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected result is that the hyperlink builder title should be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Click on 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
